pages.text: $(major)Viral Agents/$ are the final crafting potion of the mod. They are used to craft $(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/negative)negative Genes/$, which are generally just any Gene that's harmful.$(br2)Negative Genes are $(minor)always lost on death/$, regardless of config setting. Additionally, there's a config to prevent players from even being able to $(o)get/$ negative Genes in the first place.
Virus Cultivation recipes can be crafted in the Brewing Stand or in either Incubator.
